review: I am totally amazed!  Very simple to use, and extremely nice to have.  I was surprised to find out that I can still watch movies using the Fire Stick - even when the cable/dish is down.  Although I missed the "super great sale" when they first became available, I have since purchased two of them at regular price. Amazon Fire TV Stick
author: Linda R. Walleman

review: This replaced a Roku 2 with a Fire TV Stick. The fire stick is much faster going through the menu. I also purchased the voice remote so I can just tell it what movie I'm wanting to watch and it gets the movie very quickly. It works on Amazon Prime and not sure it works with Netflix's or U Tube. I really like the upgrade plus it sets up quickly.
author: magoo

review: Amazing! Easy to use! Thought about buying this for months. Wish I had done it sooner!!!
author: Nichole

review: I bought the Fire TV Stick because I was sick of waiting on my extremely slow Blue-ray player streaming Netflix and Amazon Prime videos.  I completely recommend this to anyone who has a discount Blue-ray player and doesn't have much patience.  I have the iPhone app for it as well and it works SO much better than any remote.  I highly recommend the Fire TV Stick and the app.
